#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

We are using universal POS tags in the part-of-speech tagging task.

Mappings can be found here:
https://code.google.com/p/universal-pos-tags/downloads/list

We are using a slightly modified version according to this paper:
http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~taskar/pubs/wikipos_emnlp12.pdf
